scripts.dev: npm run init-env && npm run build:packages && concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend-server && cross-env DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=5420 DB_NAME=krapi DB_USER=postgres DB_PASSWORD=postgres JWT_SECRET=default-secret-change-this JWT_EXPIRES_IN=7d SESSION_EXPIRES_IN=1h DEFAULT_ADMIN_PASSWORD=admin123 PORT=3470 HOST=localhost NODE_ENV=development npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend-manager && cross-env HOSTNAME=127.0.0.1 npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:packages: npm run build:logger && npm run build:error-handler && npm run build:monitor
scripts.start: npm run init-env && concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.start:backend: cd backend-server && cross-env DB_HOST=localhost DB_NAME=krapi DB_USER=postgres DB_PASSWORD=postgres JWT_SECRET=default-secret-change-this JWT_EXPIRES_IN=7d SESSION_EXPIRES_IN=1h DEFAULT_ADMIN_PASSWORD=admin123 PORT=3470 HOST=localhost NODE_ENV=production ENABLE_TESTING=true ENABLE_PROJECT_CREATION=true npm run start
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run type-check
scripts.health: npm run install:all && npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run build
scripts.clean: cd backend-server && rmdir /s /q dist node_modules 2>nul & cd ../frontend-manager && rmdir /s /q .next node_modules 2>nul & rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
